titleStmt.title: The practice of godlines or brief rules directing Christians how to keep their hearts in a constant holy frame, and how to order their conversation aright. With an addition concerning self-examination, and the nature of faith. / By Henry Lukin minister of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lukin, H. (Henry), 1628-1719.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition revised and corrected.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Tho. Underhill in Pauls Church-yard, near the little North door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, near the little North door
